text: [Ej pajomʙar] Hidojati onon ʙar uhdai tu nest; ʙalki Alloh taolo har kiro ʙixohad hidojat mekunad; va [ej mu'minon] on ci az moli [xud] infoq mekuned, ʙa sudi xudaton ast va [ʙa jod dosta ʙosed, ki] cuz ʙaroi xusnudii Alloh taolo infoq nakuned; va on ci az mol infoq mekuned, [podosas] ʙa tavri komil va tamom ʙa sumo doda mesavad va [hargiz] sitam naxohed did
